TITLE

ARTICLE

contents.title: Courses Offered by DSE
contents.author: Dr. Jiliang Tang
contents.article:
DSE Lab will be offering courses about big data and data mining here at MSU, the full list is:
  • FS 2019CSE 482 Big Data Analysis by Dr.Jiliang Tang (Tyler Derr, Haochen Liu)
  • SS 2019CSE 881 Data Mining by Dr.Jiliang Tang (Tyler Derr, Yao Ma, Haochen Liu)
  • FS 2018CSE 482 Big Data Analysis by Dr.Jiliang Tang (Tyler Derr)
  • SS 2018CSE 881 Data Mining by Dr.Jiliang Tang (Tyler Derr)
  • FS 2017CSE 482 Big Data Analysis by Dr.Jiliang Tang (Yao Ma)
  • SS 2017CSE 881 Data Mining by Dr.Jiliang Tang
